name: RPG Maker VX Ace Project File
summary: Game project created with RPG Maker VX Ace, a role-playing game (RPG) development program; similar to the .RVPROJ file, which is the project file associated with Enterbrain RPG Maker VX; contains links to resources, such as audio, graphics, and data files, referenced by the game; includes .RVDATA2 files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
